meanings.definition: Writing materials such as paper, pens, pencils, and envelopes.
meanings.sent1: I bought some stationery to write a letter to my friend.
meanings.sent2: The stationery on the desk included colorful pens and notepads.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the stationery to leave a tiny note for the birds.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a blank sheet of stationery waiting for inspiration to strike.
meanings.sent5: The stationery aisle in the store was a rainbow of possibilities for creativity.

meanings.definition: A store that sells writing materials.
meanings.sent1: I visited the stationery to buy a new notebook.
meanings.sent2: The stationery had a wide selection of pens and markers.
meanings.sent3: The stationery owner always had a smile for every customer who walked in.
meanings.sent4: The stationery was a treasure trove of tools for the aspiring writer.
meanings.sent5: The stationery shop smelled of fresh paper and ink, inviting creativity.

meanings.definition: The quality of being stationary or immobile.
meanings.sent1: The stationery of the old train made it a charming display.
meanings.sent2: The stationery of the statue gave it a sense of permanence in the park.
meanings.sent3: The stationery of the rock made it seem like a sleeping giant.
meanings.sent4: The stationery of the tree roots held the soil firmly in place.
meanings.sent5: The stationery of the mountain peak made it a majestic sight against the sky.
